Name: Yerr Out
About the game: Inspired by the game of baseball, Yerr Out is a barnstormin' good time out on the ballfield. Choose from 30 different animals to assemble your team. Each character has different attributes which are categorized by STRENGTH , SPEED , AGILITY , TECHNIQUE Controls are responsive and easy to learn. Crush hits into the gap, throw nasty curveballs, make diving plays in the outfield, and bust out slides to breakup close plays. But don't expect all the same rules as traditional baseball. In this game, there is no need for foul balls or tagging up. Put the ball in play and see what unfolds! Lots of opportunities for aggressive baserunning and slick fielding . And of course, intense pitcher vs batter matchups Future features plan to have: 3+ fields to play at 12+ unlockable characters online play + stats, leaderboards, spectator mode homerun derby, practice mode, minigame mode
